AJGMCFNDKEG: After defeating a number of Normal Opponents, you will get a die of a random Elemental Type. After defeating an Elite Opponent, you will immediately get a random Elemental Die, and you'll be able to store a max of <color=#FFCC33>4</color> dice.
When the team has character(s) aligned with a certain Element, you are <color=#FFCC33>more likely</color> to obtain dice of that Elemental Type.
